sentence: This is the last major week of the second quarter earnings season with only about 200 companies expected to report earnings.
But the end of earnings season also signals that the retailers will be reporting and this week, there's a slew of them from apparel retailers to home goods, furniture and jewelry.
However, they're not the only big names still to report.
Surprisingly, there are a handful of big name companies that will be reporting this week, many with excellent earnings records.
It isn't easy to beat nearly every quarter for years but these names have been doing that in very competitive industries.

The Best of the Rest of the Earnings Charts This Week

1.
Salesforce.com CRM hasn't missed since 2014.
This is one of the hottest stocks on the Street this year.
HP Inc. HPQ hasn't missed since it was spun-off.
This is the company that makes laptops and printers.
Will it see strong back-to-school results?
Lannett LCI had a perfect 5-year record until last quarter when it finally missed.
Will it be able to get back on track this quarter?
The drug company stocks have struggled for several years.
Broadcom AVGO hasn't missed since 2014.
Broadcom has also been one of the hottest technology stocks this year.
Can it keep the momentum?
Autodesk ADSK is a surprise contender for hottest stock of the year.
It hasn't missed since 2014 and shares have spiked to new 5-year highs.
